description: This file contains utility functions for retrieving environment variables related to backend configuration, CORS origins, OpenAI API key, and model. It helps configure aspects like server port, allowed origins, and API settings for the application.

methods.name: int get_backend_port()
methods.description: Returns the backend server port number from the 'BACKEND_PORT' environment variable, defaulting to 3001 if unset or invalid.

methods.name: List[str] get_allowed_origins()
methods.description: Returns a list of allowed CORS origins specified in the 'ALLOWED_ORIGINS' environment variable, defaulting to ['http://localhost:3000'].

methods.name: str|None get_openai_api_key()
methods.description: Returns the OpenAI API key from the environment variable 'OPENAI_API_KEY', or None if it is not set.

methods.name: str get_openai_model()
methods.description: Returns the OpenAI model name from the environment variable 'OPENAI_MODEL', defaulting to 'gpt-4o-mini' if unset.
